T02D1355:40b-1: shr'i k'a la tsa kra tantra r'a dza sya she ka pra kri yi bra tti /
T02D1355:40b-2: badzra b'a do nggha ti n'a ma /
T02D1355:40b-4: rgyud kyi rgyal po dbal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dbang gi rab tu byed pa'i 'grel pa /
T02D1355:40b-5: rdo rje'i tshig 'byed pa zhes bya ba /
T02D1355:40b-6: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1355:41a-1: rab me yis 'dzag pa'i rgya mtsho dug chu skems pa yi //
T02D1355:41a-2: bde chen nam mkha'i dbyings nas 'brug sgra rab bsgrags char rgyun bzhin du 'bebs //
T02D1355:41a-3: dpag med bskal par 'gro ba rnams la gar thabs rnam mang ston mdzad pa //
T02D1355:41a-4: gar thabs rnams kyi mchog gyur dang po'i sangs rgyas de la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D1355:41a-5: gang dag rdo rje'i mtshan ldan pa //
T02D1355:41a-6: mkha' la gshegs pa rnam gnyis dang //
T02D1355:41a-7: bla ma rdo rje 'dzin rnams kyis //
T02D1355:41a-8: bgegs med gzhung 'di bsgrub pa'i rigs //
T02D1355:41a-9: srid gsum mun nag smag tu gyur la snang ba mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas nyag gcig mya ngan 'das //
T02D1355:41a-10: de rjes gzu bor gyur pa'i 'phags pa klu sgrub la sogs da lta 'di na rab mi bzhugs //
T02D1355:41a-11: gang yang gnyis gnyis bde ba lhur len log pa'i lam ston 'gro rnams phung bskyed pa 'di //
T02D1355:41a-12: rtog ge 'dod rgyal de rnams go bya'i phyir dang bdag nyid dran phyir 'grel 'di bri bar bya //
T02D1355:41a-14: mchog gi gsang chen 'dir zhugs nas //
T02D1355:41a-15: rnal 'byor spyod pa yin zer zhing //
T02D1355:41a-16: bya ba ma yin kun la 'jug /'jig rten sun byed rkun po 'byung //
T02D1355:41a-18: mgo la chu rgyun ldugs par byed //
T02D1355:41a-19: cod pan rdo rje dril bu sogs //
T02D1355:41a-20: mgo dang lag pas rab tu 'dzin //
T02D1355:41a-21: rdo rje des ni 'tsho ba bsgrub //
T02D1355:41a-22: kha cig slob ma'i tshogs sdud cing //
T02D1355:41a-23: nga yi tshig ni 'di nyid dag / yin zhes zer zhing byis pa 'drid //
T02D1355:41a-24: gsang ba log par rab tu ston //
T02D1355:41a-25: kha cig bas mthar rab 'khod cing //
T02D1355:41a-26: bdag med shes rab pha rol phyin //
T02D1355:41a-27: skad cig tsam yang mi gnas par //
T02D1355:41a-28: 'jig rten sngags sogs sgrub par byed //
T02D1355:41a-29: kha cig slong mos rgyu byed cing //
T02D1355:41a-30: kun du 'gro zhing gya tshom smra //
T02D1355:41a-31: mi mo rnams la rab tu chags //
T02D1355:41a-32: sangs rgyas dam tshig rab tu 'jig / kha cig grong du 'khod byed cing //
T02D1355:41a-33: bza' dang btung la rab tu chags //
T02D1355:41a-34: khye'u dang bu mo phal mang dang //
T02D1355:41a-35: dgod cing rab tu rtse bar byed //
T02D1355:41a-36: kha cig rol mo zlos gar dang //
T02D1355:41a-37: glu dang rgyan po 'gyed byed dang //
T02D1355:41a-38: 'dus pa'i tshogs la lta byed cing //
T02D1355:41a-39: bzo yi gnas rnams rab tu slob //
T02D1355:41a-40: kha cig tshong dang zhing las dang //
T02D1355:41a-41: glang po ba lang gsod byed dang //
T02D1355:41a-42: shing rta la sogs 'dren pa dang //
T02D1355:41a-43: nyes pa mang po rab tu byed //
T02D1355:41b-0: @41b gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa yis //
T02D1355:41b-1: dge slong ma dang dge sbyong ma //
T02D1355:41b-2: dge bsnyen ma dang dge bsten dang //
T02D1355:41b-3: phan tshun mtshon gyis rab tu 'debs //
T02D1355:41b-4: legs par gsungs pa'i 'dul ba la //
T02D1355:41b-5: rab tu mi gnas srung mi byed //
T02D1355:41b-6: sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan sun 'byin cing //
T02D1355:41b-7: phas pham la sogs rab tu byed //
T02D1355:41b-8: gang gis btung ba'i mchog mi shes //
T02D1355:41b-9: s'a lu la sogs bcos sbyar ba'i //
T02D1355:41b-10: myos pa'i khu ba 'thung byed cing //
T02D1355:41b-11: de yis phung khrol rab tu bskyed //
T02D1355:41b-12: ces rgyal po zla ba bzang pos gsungs so //
T02D1355:41b-13: de bas na gang dag rdo rje'i tshig ma shes pas log pa'i lam du zhugs pa de rnams /
T02D1355:41b-14: log pa'i lam las bzlog par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1355:41b-15: rgyud de dang de'i nges pa dang drang pa'i don
T02D1355:41b-16: bdag gis bla ma dam pa'i zhal las thos shing
T02D1355:41b-18: gzhan yang gsang sngags kyi sgo nas spyad pa spyod
T02D1355:41b-19: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ji ltar spyad
T02D1355:41b-20: cing bslab par bya ba'i lung dang rigs pas //
T02D1355:41b-21: dbang rnam pa gnyis kyi rab tu byed pa bsdus pa'i rgyud brtag pa lnga'i don gsungs pa /
T02D1355:41b-22: 'di'i drang ba dang des pa'i don ji lta ba bzhin du dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D1355:41b-23: mi dbang pad dkar phyag na padmo 'dzin pa gang //
T02D1355:41b-24: de yis bsdus legs rab tu bkral gyur mod //
T02D1355:41b-25: 'on kyang phya mkhan mkhas pa'i rjes nas mchan bu rnams //
T02D1355:41b-26: gzod dang ster thogs nas rjes bzhin legs 'brang dang //
T02D1355:41b-27: mchan bu bdag kyang mi dbang phya mkhan rjes 'brangs nas //
T02D1355:41b-28: shes rab gzod dang sta re legs par rab bzung ste //
T02D1355:41b-29: lung rigs bla ma'i gdams ngag bzo bo'i thig btab nas //
T02D1355:41b-30: thar pa'i grong khyer brtsigs shing sgra yi 'grel pa byed //
T02D1355:41b-32: rnam gnyis dbang gi de nyid ni //
T02D1355:41b-33: gsal zhing the tshom med bdag / mkhas rnams kyis ni rnyed mi 'gyur //
T02D1355:41b-34: dbab pa spangs pa'i phyir na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1355:41b-35: dbab pa zhes bya ba ni skyes bu gang 'jig
T02D1355:41b-36: rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang mngon par
T02D1355:41b-38: thun mong gi dngos grub kyi don du byis pa skye bo rnams brid par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1355:41b-39: dkyil 'khor gcig tu legs par babs par ma gyur na /
T02D1355:41b-40: dkyil 'khor gzhan spro bar bya ba yin gyi /
T02D1355:41b-41: mchog gi dngos grub kyi don du ni ma yin te /
T02D1355:42a-2: 'di ltar mchog gi dngos grub la /
T02D1355:42a-3: dkyil 'khor gcig tu legs par babs par ma gyur pa /
T02D1355:42a-4: gzhan du 'bab pas mchog tu gyur pa de ltan ni /
T02D1355:42a-5: bde bar gshegs pa rnams la yang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa mnga' ba dang /
T02D1355:42a-6: gzhan yang stobs che chung mnga' bar yang 'gyur bas /
T02D1355:42a-9: kun rdzob tsam du byis pa so so'i skya bo rnams brid pa'i phyir yin gyi /
T02D1355:42a-10: de na dam par ni ma yin par khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D1355:42a-11: de la gang kun rdzob tsam du thun mong gi
T02D1355:42a-12: dngos grub byis pa rnams kyis rtogs par bya ba
T02D1355:42a-16: sman gsum gyis kyang 'bebs par byed do //
T02D1355:42a-17: slob dpon ting nge 'dzin la mchog tu gzhol ba /
T02D1355:42a-18: ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu thob pa rnams kyis ni /
T02D1355:42a-19: ting nge 'dzin 'ba' zhig gis 'bebs par byed do //
T02D1355:42a-20: bzlas pa cho ga bzhin du gyur pas kyang 'bebs par byed do //
T02D1355:42a-21: de gnyis ka dang ldan pas kyang 'bebs par byed la /
T02D1355:42a-22: sman 'ba' zhig gis 'bebs pa dag kyang yod de /
T02D1355:42a-23: de ni mchog ma yin no //
T02D1355:42a-24: dkyil 'khor gyi nang du 'jug par byed pa rnams la /
T02D1355:42a-25: rnam grangs de lta bu babs pa na /
T02D1355:42a-26: dge ba dang mi dge ba thams cad dris la /
T02D1355:42a-27: dge bar gyur pa de ltan ni legs te /
T02D1355:42a-28: cho ga la 'jug par bya la /
T02D1355:42a-29: mi dge bar gyur na ni zhi bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1355:42a-30: zhib dang rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg la sogs pa mtshan
T02D1355:42a-31: ma ngan pa zhi bar gyur gyi bar du byas
T02D1355:42a-32: la / phyi nas cho ga la 'jug par bya'o //
T02D1355:42a-33: de la dpal dus kyi 'khor lo 'dir 'jug pa'i
T02D1355:42a-34: slob ma la dbab par bya ba ni mi 'chi
T02D1355:42a-35: lnga dang mar me lnga'i spos sngon du cho ga
T02D1355:42a-37: des slob ma la bdug par bya zhing /
T02D1355:42a-38: aom a'a: ra ra ra ra /
T02D1355:42a-40: badzra a'a be sha ya h'um zhes bya ba dang bcas pas khro bo'i rgyal po bskul bar bya'o //
T02D1355:42a-41: de yang sngags kyi rkang pa 'di rnams sngon du
T02D1355:42a-42: bye ba phrag gcig bzlas shing sbyin sreg 'bum phrag
T02D1355:42a-43: bcu yis bsnyen pa byas nas /
T02D1355:42a-44: gdod bsams pa tsam gyis 'bebs par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T02D1355:42a-45: gzhan yang rdzas 'ba' zhig gis 'bebs pa ni 'di lta ste /
T02D1355:42a-46: yi dags khar ni gu gul bdug //
T02D1355:42a-47: mar ngo yi dags nyin zhag la //
T02D1355:42a-48: yi dags mes bsregs bdug pas ni //
T02D1355:42a-51: thod pa de dang gser shing gi /'bras bu ma du lung ga dang //
T02D1355:42a-52: aa la tsi kra shu dag dang //
T02D1355:42b-0: zhes gsungs te de ni @42b mchog ma yin no //
T02D1355:42b-1: de la gal te khro bo'i rgyal po babs par
T02D1355:42b-2: gyur pa de lta na ni mtshan nyid 'dir 'gyur
T02D1355:42b-3: te / khro bo'i rgyal po bab na ni //
T02D1355:42b-4: mtshon cha dang bcas lag pa yis //
T02D1355:42b-5: bdud sde rnams la khro 'dzum byed //
T02D1355:42b-7: g-yas brkyang la sogs rkang pa yis //
T02D1355:42b-8: sna tshogs rdo rje'i gar yang byed //
T02D1355:42b-9: yi ge h'um gi sgra yis ni //
T02D1355:42b-10: bdud dpung sreg byed sgra yang 'byin //
T02D1355:42b-11: dang po'i las kyi rnal 'byor la //
T02D1355:42b-12: grangs med rgyud las gsungs pa yis //
T02D1355:42b-13: mi rnams la ni glu gar ston //
T02D1355:42b-14: khro bo'i yon tan dbang gis ni //
T02D1355:42b-15: ngo tsha bral zhing som nyi med //
T02D1355:42b-16: mtshan ma gang dang gang ston pa //
T02D1355:42b-17: de tshe dngos grub rgyur shes bya /
T02D1355:42b-18: lus dang ngag gi dbye ba yis //
T02D1355:42b-19: lus babs pas ni mkha' la 'gro //
T02D1355:42b-21: ri bo la sogs 'degs par byed //
T02D1355:42b-22: ngag ni babs pa tsam gyis kyang //
T02D1355:42b-23: srid gsum la gnas lha klu las //
T02D1355:42b-24: ngag rtsod pa las rgyal 'gyur te //
T02D1355:42b-26: sems babs pha rol sems shes shing //
T02D1355:42b-28: dus gsum lkog tu gyur pa rnams //
T02D1355:42b-29: ma lus lus pa med par shes //
T02D1355:42b-30: dang po'i las kyi rnal 'byor la //
T02D1355:42b-31: sangs rgyas spyan gyis byin brlabs pa'i //
T02D1355:42b-32: sa babs pas ni ri bo ltar //
T02D1355:42b-33: grangs med skyes bus mi sgul la //
T02D1355:42b-34: m'a ma k'i yis byin brlabs pa'i //
T02D1355:42b-35: chu babs pas ni bsil 'gyur zhing //
T02D1355:42b-36: tsha ba'i rims sogs zin pa la //
T02D1355:42b-37: 'khyud pa tsam gyis bsil bar byed //
T02D1355:42b-38: na bza' dkar mos byin brlabs pa'i //
T02D1355:42b-39: me babs pas ni sreg byed cing //
T02D1355:42b-40: gang bsam de ni sreg byed la //
T02D1355:42b-41: ri bo'ang thal ba lta bur byed //
T02D1355:42b-42: sgrol mas byin gyis brlabs gyur pa'i //
T02D1355:42b-43: rlung babs pas ni skyes bu dag / bsams pa tsam gyis de sgrol cing //
T02D1355:42b-44: dpag tshang bye bar skrod par byed //
T02D1355:42b-45: stong pa babs pas mthong mi 'gyur //
T02D1355:42b-46: mkha' la spyod pa nyid du 'gyur //
T02D1355:42b-47: mig babs pas ni mdzes gzugs dang //
T02D1355:42b-48: ma mthong rjes kyang mthong bar 'gyur //
T02D1355:42b-49: lha yi rna ba babs gyur na //
T02D1355:42b-51: lha yi yid ni phebs gyur na //
T02D1355:42b-52: gzhan sems shes pa ye shes 'byung //
T02D1355:42b-53: lha yi lus dbang babs gyur na //
T02D1355:42b-54: reg bya mchog tu gyur pa 'dzin //
T02D1355:43a-2: ro mchog bzang po myang bar 'gyur //
T02D1355:43a-3: lha yi shangs ni babs pa yis //
T02D1355:43a-4: dri bzangs sna yis tshor bar 'gyur //
T02D1355:43a-5: zhes bya ba ni nges pa ste /
T02D1355:43a-6: sangs rgyas kyi bka' lung ngo //
T02D1355:43a-7: babs pa'i mtshan nyid rgyas par bstan pa'o /
T02D1355:43a-9: // / spangs pa'i zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1355:43a-10: dbab pa zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
T02D1355:43a-12: lha rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs te babs pa la
T02D1355:43a-13: bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa dris nas
T02D1355:43a-14: spang bar bya'o // de yang aom a'a:h'um zhes bya
T02D1355:43a-15: bas me tog gam yang na bdag nyid kyi gos
T02D1355:43a-17: spyi bor bzhag pa'am bya bas pas rang rang gi gnas su gshegs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1355:43a-18: gal te des kyang spangs par ma gyur na /
T02D1355:43a-19: de'i spyi bor sa'i dkyil 'khor dang ri rab kyis mnan pas ni spangs par 'gyur te /
T02D1355:43a-20: sngon du ni ma yin no //
T02D1355:43a-21: phyi nas mgo dang snying ga spyi gtsug lte mgrin dang /
T02D1355:43a-22: gsang ba las ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1355:43a-23: spyi bor ni yi ge aom mo /
T02D1355:43a-24: snying gar ni yi ge h'um ngo //
T02D1355:43a-25: spyi gtsug tu ni ham ste thabs kyi cha'o //
T02D1355:43a-26: rang rang rig par gnas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1355:43a-27: thabs kyi yul la spyi bo spyi gtsug snying ga yin la /
T02D1355:43a-28: shes rab kyi yul ni lte mgrin gsang ba'o //
T02D1355:43a-29: rdo rje gsum zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1355:43a-30: sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge gsum gyi ngo bo'o //
T02D1355:43a-31: shes rab kyi cha la dgod pa'i yi ge gang yin zhe na /
T02D1355:43a-33: mgrin par ni a'a: gsang ba ni ksha'o //
T02D1355:43a-34: bsrung zhes bya ba ni gnas drug po der bsrung ba'o //
T02D1355:43a-35: gzhan du de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes kyi rdo
T02D1355:43a-36: rje ma shes pa'i byis pa rnams la bdud kyi
T02D1355:43a-38: lus la gos dmar bskon zhing mig dag dgab pa ste //
T02D1355:43a-40: ye shes kyi ma mtshon par bya ba'i don du'o //
T02D1355:43a-41: slob ma 'dir ni gzhug par bya zhes bya ba
T02D1355:43a-42: ni dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo
T02D1355:43a-43: 'dir ro // kun rdzob tu brtul zhugs zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1355:43a-44: las dang po ba'i byis pa'i skye bos 'di kho
T02D1355:43a-45: na ma mthong ba rnams kyis bsod nams kyi tshogs
T02D1355:43a-46: kyi don du ye shes thob par ma gyur gyi
T02D1355:43a-47: bar du 'bad pas bsrung bar bya ba yin te
T02D1355:43a-48: / brtul zhugs zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
T02D1355:43a-49: mchog gi 'gro ba song ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1355:43a-50: rnam par gzigs nas sh'akya thub pa la thug pa yang brtul zhugs 'di la brten nas /
T02D1355:43a-51: mchog gi gnas brnyes zhes bya'o //
T02D1355:43b-0: 'gro ba zhes bya ba bsod nams kyi @43b tshogs de dang /
T02D1355:43b-1: ye shes kyi tshogs 'di dag gis mchog gi gnas su 'dod pa'o //
T02D1355:43b-2: de la sbyin zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1355:43b-3: slob dpon rnams kyi slob ma las dang po pa rnams la /
T02D1355:43b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1355:43b-6: de la brtul zhugs kyang gang yin zhe na /
T02D1355:43b-7: mnar sems mi bden gzhan gyi bud med spangs te gzhan gyi nor dang de bzhin chang //
T02D1355:43b-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1355:43b-9: mnar sems kyi sgras ni mi'i 'gro ba la sogs pa gsod pa lta ci smos kyi /
T02D1355:43b-10: srog dang ldan pa thams cad la /
T02D1355:43b-11: skad cig tsam mnar sems byas pas kyang byang chub kyi spyod pa las nyams par rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1355:43b-13: sems can rnams la slu ba'i thabs yang dag par bzung ste /
T02D1355:43b-14: bdag gis 'dod pa la sems gnas nas brdzun du smra na /
T02D1355:43b-15: gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams te /
T02D1355:43b-16: las dang po pa'i ltung bar rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1355:43b-17: gzhan gyi bud med spangs te zhes pa ste /
T02D1355:43b-18: gsang sngags kyi spyad pa spyod pa rnams la /
T02D1355:43b-19: phyag rgya chen po'i mtha' rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1355:43b-20: rgyud de dang de las gsungs pa'i mtshan phun sum
T02D1355:43b-21: tshogs pa'i mi mo gzhan gyis yongs su ma bzung
T02D1355:43b-22: ba ni gnang ba kho na yin la de'i phyir
T02D1355:43b-23: mi ldog pa'i dbang thob pa rnams la 'dzag pa'i
T02D1355:43b-24: bde ba'i phyir ni gnang ba med pa la mi
T02D1355:43b-25: 'gyur ba'i phyir ni bsten pa kho na yin no
T02D1355:43b-26: // dang po'i las can rnams la ni 'dzag pa yin yang rang gi bkag pa med do /
T02D1355:43b-27: de ltar rnal 'byor pa de gnyis ka dag gis kyang //
T02D1355:43b-28: gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba'i mi mo ni bsten par mi bya'o //
T02D1355:43b-29: gal te bsten na 'jig rten pa'i kha na ma tho bas sdig tu 'gyur zheng /
T02D1355:43b-30: de'i stobs kyis dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ro //
T02D1355:43b-31: gzhan gyi nor dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1355:43b-32: dud 'gro yan chad kyis yongs su bzung ba bdag gir rku ba'i sems kyis mi bya ste /
T02D1355:43b-33: bde bar gshegs pas bkag pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1355:43b-34: de bzhin chang zhes bya ba ni mi btung zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T02D1355:43b-35: gang de ni nyes pa kun gyi rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1355:43b-36: myos pa'i bar du btung bar mi bya'o //
T02D1355:43b-37: myos pa ma yin par ni bkag pa med do //
T02D1355:43b-38: de bas na myos pa rab tung bar mi bya zhes bya ba'i don to //

T02D1355:62b-24: slar yang aa wa dh'u t'i'i snying ga la sogs pa'i ze 'bru'i gnas phug nas 'gro la /
T02D1355:62b-25: la la n'a dang ra sa n'a ni g-yas g-yon gyi padma'i kun du spyod pa'i dbang gis 'gro'o //

T02D1355:62b-27: mgrin pa'i dbus nas lam gsum nas 'gro'o //

T02D1355:62b-31: dpral ba'i dbus su lam gsum du byas nas /

T02D1355:62b-33: ra sa n'a ni g-yas pa nas 'gro zhing /

T02D1355:62b-35: thur sel zhes pa ni lte ba'i 'og tu yang de bzhin du 'gro zhes bya ba'i don to //

T02D1355:62b-37: steng du g-yas g-yon dbus dang gsum yin la /

T02D1355:62b-39: rdo rje padmar bcas zhes pa ni /
T02D1355:62b-40: bud med rnams kyi skye gnas dang /
T02D1355:62b-41: rgyu mthun pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro ;

T02D1355:62b-43: zhes pa ni rang bzhin gyi phyir ro //
T02D1355:62b-44: rlung gnyis 'dom ba dag gi dbus zhes pa ni

T02D1355:62b-46: // yul dang yul can rnams zhes pa ni /
T02D1355:62b-47: mig la sogs pa rtsa rnams kyi 'byung 'jug ste /

T02D1355:63a-1: mtshan ma 'dzin pa yang ni zhes pa ni aa wa dh'u t'i'i sgo nas so //
T02D1355:63a-2: yang gi sgra de nyid lte bar ro //
T02D1355:63a-3: thams cad gsang chen no zhes pa ni byis pa'i skye bo rnams la gsang bar nges pa'o //
T02D1355:63a-4: de ni rnal 'byor pa'i nye bar bsdu ba brjod pa'i phyir /

T02D1355:63a-14: ri bong la gnas pa zhes pa ni /

T02D1355:63a-16: srog de bcing bar bya ba'i nges pa yin la /
T02D1355:63a-17: de bas na srog zhugs zhes ba ni /
T02D1355:63a-18: gnyis pa gsung gi rdo rje brjod do //
T02D1355:63a-19: sems ni phyag rgyas rab sbyar zhes pa ni /

T02D1355:63a-21: mchog gi bde gnas rdo rje sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir zhes pa ni /

T02D1355:63a-23: dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba de lta na ni
T02D1355:63a-24: / padmar rdo rje'i sgra zhes bya ba skad cig

T02D1355:63a-26: / no // gal te shes rab ma rnyed pa de lta na ni /
T02D1355:63a-27: chu skyes rang lag gis gsor bde don du //

T02D1355:63a-30: de yang mi 'dzag pa'i bde ba'i don du yin gyi /
T02D1355:63a-31: 'dzag pa'i phyir ni ma gsungs so //

T02D1355:63a-35: de nyid bzhi pa ye shes kyi rdo rje nyid de rnal 'byor goms pa rnams kyi nges pa'o //

T02D1355:63a-39: bas g-yas pa'am g-yon pa la rgyu ba'i dus su

T02D1355:63a-42: dus su sems stong pa la gzhag pa rnams la

T02D1355:63a-45: gang g-yon nas nam mkha' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1355:63a-46: rgyu ba de'i phyir sa ni chur 'jug ces bya
T02D1355:63b-0: gang yang tshig de ni g-yas @63b kyi srog rgyu ba na /

T02D1355:63b-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //

T02D1355:63b-6: gzhan yang g-yon gyi rtsa la ni /

T02D1355:63b-29: 'bar ba'i dri med sems te zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1355:63b-30: sku'i dga' bral 'gags pa las sprul pa'i sku'i thugs su 'gyur ro //

T02D1355:63b-37: gi dga' ba 'gags pas sangs rgyas rnams kyi longs
T02D1355:63b-39: mchog dga' dga' bral bcas pa 'di rim bzhin //

T02D1355:63b-42: dga' bral zhes bya ba ngag gi dga' bral 'gags pas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i thugs su 'gyur ro //

T02D1355:64a-2: pas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i ye shes su 'gyur ro
T02D1355:64a-3: // de nas chos kyi gzhi ni /

T02D1355:64a-9: brgyal las nges par chos kyi sems so zhes pa
T02D1355:64a-10: ni thugs kyi dga' bral 'gags pa las chos kyi

T02D1355:64a-13: thugs kyi lhan cig skyes pa 'gags pa las chos kyi sku'i ye shes su 'gyur ro //

T02D1355:64a-34: ni mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po don dam

T02D1355:64a-44: byang chub kyi sems cha bcu drug ba zla ba'i chos can yang 'gags pas /
T02D1355:64a-45: rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od //

T02D1355:65a-29: dpa' bo'i ston mo la sogs pa la /

T02D1355:71b-45: 'gro rnams ngo mtshar bskyed phyir spyan ras gzigs dbang gis //
T02D1355:71b-46: 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang sgrol ma'i sras su 'gyur zhes bsgrags //
T02D1355:71b-47: des kyang sngon gyi dam bcas bshol ba mi mnga' bas //
T02D1355:71b-48: bsdus rgyud me tog phreng 'grel dri ma med 'di mdzad //
T02D1355:71b-49: rab 'byed dbang gi 'grel pa rdo rje'i tshig / legs par 'byed byed bdag brtsams dge ba gang //
T02D1355:71b-50: chu bo'i rgyun ltar rab 'bab dge ba des //
T02D1355:71b-51: chos 'byung dri med grong khyer mchog thob shog //
T02D1355:71b-52: / dbang gi rab tu byed pa'i 'grel pa /
T02D1355:71b-53: rdo rje'i tshig 'byed pa zhes bya ba /
T02D1355:71b-54: dge slong mkhas pa chen po d'a ri ka pas mdzad pa /
